# awesome-wrap



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                        | Description                                       |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| `--awesome-lg`              | The view breakpoint for lg. (Default: 960)        |
| `--awesome-md`              | The view breakpoint for md. (Default: 720)        |
| `--awesome-outer-lg`        | The outer view breakpoint of lg. (Default: 992)   |
| `--awesome-outer-md`        | The outer view breakpoint of md. (Default: 768)   |
| `--awesome-outer-sm`        | The outer view breakpoint of sm. (Default: 576)   |
| `--awesome-outer-xl`        | The outer view breakpoint of xl. (Default: 1200)  |
| `--awesome-outer-xs`        | The outer view breakpoint of xs. (Default: 0)     |
| `--awesome-outer-xxl`       | The outer view breakpoint of xxl. (Default: 1400) |
| `--awesome-sm`              | The view breakpoint for sm. (Default: 540)        |
| `--awesome-wrap-background` | Background of the inner container                 |
| `--awesome-wrap-padding`    | Padding of the inner container                    |
| `--awesome-xl`              | The view breakpoint for xl. (Default: 1140)       |
| `--awesome-xs`              | The view breakpoint for xs. (Default: 0)          |
| `--awesome-xxl`             | The view breakpoint for xxl. (Default: 1320)      |
